document.full_text: top libyan oil official shokri ghanem has not defected, contrary to widespread reports, and is secretly working for muammar gaddafi to maintain ties with big oil companies, sources at western firms said.
document.title: exclusive: libya's ghanem may be on secret government mission
lines_and_colors: top libyan oil official shokri ghanem has not defected, contrary to widespread reports, and is secretly working for muammar gaddafi to maintain ties with big oil companies, sources at western firms said.
